metadata.name: CryptoCitizens Mint Pack 1/49
metadata.description:
A CryptoCitizens Mint Pack is a limited edition NFT that when redeemed, unlocks 6 Founding Citizen Golden Token (FCGT) NFTs for City 5 -10 and 1Â CryptoGalactican NFT. 

Founding Citizen Golden Token holders will have preferential scheduling for the first 50 mints of the city's collection during an exclusive opening night event. 

Mint Packs can be redeemed here: https://www.brightmoments.io/mintpack
